scripts.build,test: npm run --silent build && npm run --silent test
scripts.build,test,bench: npm run --silent build && npm run --silent test && npm run --silent bench
scripts.build,bench: npm run --silent build && npm run --silent bench
scripts.build: bash -c '[[ -z "${PSP_DOCKER}" ]] && npm run --silent _build || npm run --silent _emsdk -- npm run --silent _build'
scripts.test:build: bash -c '[[ -z "${PSP_DOCKER}" ]] && npm run --silent _build_test || npm run --silent _emsdk -- npm run --silent _build_test'
scripts.test:run: npm run --silent _puppeteer -- node_modules/.bin/lerna exec --concurrency 1  ${PACKAGE:+--scope=@jpmorganchase/${PACKAGE}} -- npm run --silent test:run
scripts._puppeteer: docker run -it --rm --shm-size=2g -u root -e WRITE_TESTS=${WRITE_TESTS} -e PACKAGE=${PACKAGE} -v $(pwd):/src -w /src perspective/puppeteer
